changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.product_network AS SELECT n.id, p.name AS parent, rel.name AS relationship, c.name AS child, n.ordering, n.inferred, n.notes, u.name AS updated_by, n.update_date FROM ruleform.product_network n JOIN ruleform.product p ON n.parent = p.id JOIN ruleform.relationship rel ON n.relationship = rel.id JOIN ruleform.product c ON n.child = c.id JOIN ruleform.agency u ON n.updated_by = u.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.product_network OWNER TO core;
